Clone Wars: Season One

by Mark Rustad

I watched the “Clone Wars” movie when it was first released in 2008. It is probably the worst movie I've ever seen in theaters. My roommates (including Ryan H.) and I were the only ones in the theater, and we spent the whole time mocking it. As such, I was hesitant when I heard about the similarly-named show that was to follow the movie. Fortunately, “Clone Wars” the show is much better than “Clone Wars”...
